Job Description: Responsibilities:     Automate Test scripts   Designing, developing and maintaining automated tests   Identifying, analyzing, and documenting bugs   Independently determine and develop approaches to solutions   Document and effectively communicate test results   Perform manual tests     Successful candidate will need:    Familiarity with Jira & Confluence, Jenkins, AWS/Google Cloud Platform     4+ years Quality Assurance/testing Experience   Experience writing test cases in Python/Ruby   Experience in Linux administration    Ability to solve complex problems with simple and elegant solutions   Work experience with automation technologies   Experience in writing test plan and test reports   Experience using version control tools like Git
